Take Your Trading Career To The Next Level Using Daily Bread Trading Profit with over 89% accuracy

Watch this video for better understanding

Have you struggled to make consistent profit from the forex market?

Are you tired of fake Youtube courses which haven’t been so beneficial to your trading career?

Are you tired of blowing accounts and losing various prop  firms?

Do you want to start your trading career on a clean sheet with a solid strategy backed by lifetime mentorship with money back guarantee if you did not turn out profitable?

Listen, I was like you. I reached my frustration point in 2017. I struggled for over 5 years as a trader due to wrong information and mentorship. I lost so many accounts and went into debt. August 12 2017 I vowed to find the solution to my losses and that led me to the design, programming and modification of Daily Bread Trading Profit indicator software and the rest is a story of continuous progress and profiting.

I was in my final year as a mechanical engineering student when I found my path to consistent profiting in the forex market. In 2019 I came back from nysc. I got married to the wife of my youth at age 27.

I have paid the price for you through my failures and success and I am offering you my secret to sound and consistent profitable trading.

I know by now you must have read about the high failure rate of traders. I was in that category before I designed Daily Bread profit Trading indicator software. 70% of traders give up within their first 5 years of trading. There are so many factors that contribute to this high failure rate. Some of these factors are:

  • Lack of high win rate strategy
  • Poor money management
  • Poor trading psychology
  • Poor mentorship and support group

Before I go on, let me introduce myself.

I am Ugochuwku Nwaebiem. Founder of Daily Bread Profit Trading indicator software.

Over the years I have trained over 1000 students, some of whom have gone ahead to start their trading companies. I have been trading full time and profitably since 2017 and I must confess forex trading has blessed my life, my friends and family.

Do you know that trading can be as simple as ABCD if only you are able to overcome the four factors listed above in your trading career. This brings me back to Daily Bread profit Trading Software which has over 89% accuracy.

Have you ever wondered what an 89% winning rate really means?

Did you know that with just 60% win rate you have joined the top 20% profitable traders and with over 89% win rate you are among the top 5% profitable traders.

Having a win rate of over 89% means that in every 10 traders you took, you will win 8-9. That’s a crazy win rate and it’s not hype. I will show you how this is possible and can be achieved no matter the type of trader you want to be using the Daily Bread Profit Trading indicator software.

Check out the image below. This is a swing Buy position on EURUSD which started on 11th November and ended on 29th. The first position dropped 410 pips. That’s just one position, imagine having the second and third entry which is the green smaller arrows, you will definitely bag over 1000 pips just within two weeks.

Check out the image below.

That’s 99 pips bagged in a day just selling EURUSD

Why Daily Bread Profit Trading Software?

Daily Bread Profit Software is the best group of indicators that you will see in the forex trading space due to its high trading accuracy. Here are few reasons:

1.

It comes with a high structural trading zone(order blocks or support and resistance: These zones are so accurate that it doesn’t shift or repaint when confirmed. The zones are of 5 types that are automatically labeled showing there level of strength and consistency.

2.

It comes with an accurate entry confirmation; Yes, this conformation does not shift. Once the entry confirmation shows price will always move in the direction of the entry confirmation. This is applicable for scalpers, day traders, sessional traders and swing traders. This mean that no trader is left out of using the trading indicator.

3.

It comes with extra trend entry confirmation; this means that you cant be left out of the move if you miss the first entry alert. The software drops more entry confirmation along the trend so that those who saw the trade setup late can also make sweet profit from the move. The beauty of this entry confirmations is that it is alway in alignment with the trend and comes from a valid supply and demand zone.

4.

It comes with a good risk to reward ratio which puts you on a high profit ratio. The least risk to reward is 1:3 and that’s just the beginning stage. The software delivers 1:12 and more on one single trade.

5.

It is simple to install and understand. You can set up the trading indicator within 5 minutes and start trading. The configuration has been done for you, your plug and play then enjoy high quality setups based on time and price.

6.

It comes with a time and price entry confirmation: There are specific times in a day that the indicator drops confirmations. This will help you have enough free time for yourself and only come within those entry confirmation times to pick trades for the day.

7.

The indicator comes with an alert system. This alert system is the first and accurate entry. It comes with a popup sound which states the pair, time and price of entry and the timeframe. Your responsibility is to enter the trade, set stop loss and take profit.

8.

It works in every tradable instrument within  meta-trader 4. Yes the indicator spotted the massive bullish movement in various crypto pairs. If you love trading crypto currencies, this indicator is for you.

These are just a few distinctions between Daily Bread Trading Profit and other low end trading indicators out there. 

Here are few of the great testimonies from its users

You might be asking if it works perfectly and why sell it. One who has such a secret should keep it to himself. Listen before you say more, I can boldly tell you your mind has been infested with a poverty mindset. Why do you pay to go to school? Why do your lecturer and teachers get paid to impact knowledge in you?

 

Now listen to this great testimony from The Bitcoin Princ

Benefits of Using Daily Bread Profit Trading indicator

  • Free Qualification of $15,000 Next step funded account; I will help you to gain access to bigger funds through by qualifying your prop account especially next step funded.
  • Access to lifetime mentorship: Yes the indicator gives you access to my mentorship group. On a normal go, gaining access to my mentorship program costs $100 monthly. My mentorship program gives you direct access to me and the entire winning team.
  • Bi-weekly Classes: I host biweekly webinars for all participants and teach deeper things about trading and investment. In biweekly webinars we go through the indicator and uses over and over again so that everyone can actively get involved and upgrade their learning and earning.
  • Access to Daily Chart and Signals: As your mentor and founder of Daily Bread Profit Indicator, i send my chart and market views to all participants to join and make money even while learning.
  • Lifetime access to VIP 24/7 support group

Bonuses

  • Detailed introduction to forex trading: I will give you access to my introduction course on forex trading. This will give you the basic, moderate knowledge you need to excel in this industry(Real Value $150).
  • Access to forex trading advanced course: You will gain access to my forex trading advanced course which will fortify you and put you on the path of consistent profiting. This advanced course is modeled to fit into you day to day activities, so you have no excuse to give(Real Value $300).
  • Access to my wealth management course: You will gain lifetime access to my wealth management course where I discussed principles of building and sustaining wealth. If it's for making money from forex trading using my indicators its a sure promise but you will need to learn how to manage that and use it to invest in more assets than liabilities(Real value $100).
  • Access to my Money Management course; Trading is not about making profit but protecting your capital and multiplying your profit. This is where money management comes into play. You need solid money management principles to last long and maximize the good things that forex trading brings(real value $100).
  • Access to Trading Psychology course; it is important that you understand that forex trading is a business between your mind and your will. You need to find harmony between your mind(emotions) and your will. This is called a winning trading psychology. Trading Psychology plays a huge role in your profiting from the forex market and you won’t like to miss this course(Real value $150).
  • Access to my Trading Compound interest course; You will get access to my course where I teach on the principles of compound interest in trading and how you can make huge money through compound interest as a trader(Real Value $80).

The total value of the bonus courses is $880 but you will get all for free once you get the Daily Bread Indicator Software.

  • What’s the difference between Daily Bread Profit Trading Indicator Software and Forex robot?- Daily Bread Profit Trading Indicator software is designed to follow a pure price action trading model, does all the chart analysis and drops entry based on time and price. You don’t need to do any analysis, your work is to be in total control of your money management when entering the trades but forex robots don't allow you to be in full control of your money management.
  • Is this system difficult to use: No it's not as you can see from the video and images above. It is a plug and play trading model.
  • Does the system have money management? Yes it has an inbuilt money management with a good risk to reward ratio. The least is 1:3RR
  • Does the system work in any market conduction? Yes it works in all market conditions. It also shows the present market condition and tells you how best to approach it.
  • Can I use the system for a free demo? Yes it works on demo, live and all prop firm accounts on meta-trader 4.
  • I don't know anything about forex trading, how will the software help me make money?: This is why I am giving you access to my introduction course in forex and advanced course for free. These courses will equip you with the best understanding of the business and how to make meaningful profit from trading.
  • How long will this offer be available?; The indicator is limited and only available to the first 50 persons on lifetime access. Subsequent users pay $50 monthly to use it.
  • I don't have enough money to trade: Gone are the days where lack of equity limits you from making meaningful profit from the forex market. Thank God for prop firms and I will qualify a $15,000 nextstep funded account for free for you. Giving you serious equity for trading.
  • I am a busy person and my work will not give me time to trade: This is the reason you use this indicator software. The swing trading approach works best for busy professionals. Even the days trading which comes with time and price concept also works best for you with over 92% accuracy.
  • Trading is stressful: That's not true,  With Daily bread profit indicator software you just need 2-3 hour in london or new york to find a sweet entry for awesome profit for the day.
